introduction: The Back Engineering Show discusses the challenges and benefits of multithreading in backend applications, specifically in networking and connection management. The host, Hussein Nelson, explores the nature of CPU and I/O bound tasks and the importance of understanding the characteristics of your backend. The episode also delves into the management of threads and resource access, and the problem of thread contention.
